data.eml:eml: Review of selected species of Campsurus Eaton 1868 (Ephemeroptera: Polymitarcyidae), with description of eleven new species and a key to male imagos of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Molineri, Carlos, Salles, Frederico F. (2017): Review of selected species of Campsurus Eaton 1868 (Ephemeroptera: Polymitarcyidae), with description of eleven new species and a key to male imagos of the genus. Zootaxa 4300 (3): 301-354, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4300.3.1
